description: Canonical shape of an entity used within Invocation Architecture.

id.description: Stable, unique identifier for the entity (preferably globally unique within the brand).

entity_class.description: The type or class of entity (e.g., Product, Plan, Vehicle, Hotel, Service).

description.description: Short, precise description optimized for both humans and AI.

attributes.description: Key-value map of entity attributes used in Invocation (e.g., protein_per_serving, premium_amount).

relationships.description: List of relationships to other entities (e.g., part_of, compares_to, owned_by).

source_of_truth.description: Primary system or dataset where this entity is governed.
